text: & ðone unablinendan ðurst & ða <æwisciban> nacodnisse & ða ecan þistru & ðone bryne þæs sweartan fyres & þone unarefendlican cile.
& þæt eara earmlicost is þæt he næfre god meg þence ne god hine ne ðæs nowiht elles bið gehired nimðe wop & hrop & wea.
Se ðe wile him ðas trego bebeorgan bewarnige he him <unrihtgestreon> & unrihthæmed & dierne geligero eorre & æfeste & oferhyd & mæne aðas & <wifsocne>, morðor & wyrgnisse.

Forðonþe cweden is in þære rædinge þæt seo wirig cwedule tunge ne gestigeð heo æfre godes rice ne mæg næfre nænig mon asecggan heofona rices gefean ne ðære fægernisse godes mihta & his micelnisse þurh gife usses dominus hælendes christes se lifað & rixað in ecnesse butan ænigum ende, amen.
